Item.Name: Mardi Grogs
Item.Content:
Mardi Grogs in Disney's Port Orleans Resort - French Quarter, Disney's Port Orleans Resort - French Quarter, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Mardi Grogs

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001869.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Every day’s Fat Tuesday here! Celebrate with specialty drinks frozen or on the rocks, wine, sangria and draft beers, including Abita Amber and TurboDog. You can even get it to go and take a leisurely stroll along the Sassagoula River.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: In-Room Dining - Disney's Port Orleans Resort - French Quarter
Item.Content:
Pizza Delivery & More - Disney's Port Orleans Resort - French Quarter in Disney's Port Orleans Resort - French Quarter, Disney's Port Orleans Resort - French Quarter, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Pizza Delivery & More - Disney's Port Orleans Resort - French Quarter

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/53473.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Put your hunger to rest—order oven-fresh pizza, even after the sun’s gone to bed! Kick things off with one of our scrumptious starters, sink your teeth into a slice, wash it down with a glass of beer or wine and then seal the deal with some dessert.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: Sassagoula Floatworks and Food Factory
Item.Content:
Sassagoula Floatworks and Food Factory in Disney's Port Orleans Resort - French Quarter, Disney's Port Orleans Resort - French Quarter, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Sassagoula Floatworks and Food Factory

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002110.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Dine like a Mardi Gras reveler—bite into a beignet to begin your day, before moving onto a smattering of po ' boy sandwiches at lunch. Then, come suppertime, celebrate the spirit of New Orleans with gumbo, jambalaya, fried chicken and more.
  Cuisine: American/Cajun/Creole
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Scat Cat's Club
Item.Content:
Scat Cat's Club in Disney's Port Orleans Resort - French Quarter, Disney's Port Orleans Resort - French Quarter, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Scat Cat's Club

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002112.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Unwind with a soothing blend of piano and jazz vocal as showcased by Tom Casey—now performing select nights! Savor Southern-style sips while mulling jazz memorabilia. A full bar is also available.
  Cuisine: American
